description: A tool for running Python code in a REPL environment.

tool_description.default_value: A Python shell. Use this to execute python commands. Input should be a valid python command. If you want to see the output of a value, you should print it out with `print(...)`.

global_imports.info: A comma-separated list of modules to import globally, e.g. 'math,numpy'.

success.tool_created: Python REPL Tool created with global imports: {imports}

errors.invalid_global_imports_type: global_imports must be either a string or a list
errors.tool_creation_failed: Failed to create Python REPL tool: {error}
